meanings.definition: Not made better or more valuable
meanings.sent1: The unimproved road was bumpy and rough to drive on.
meanings.sent2: The unimproved land had not been enhanced with any new features.
meanings.sent3: The unimproved house looked like it needed some love and care.
meanings.sent4: Her unimproved skills in painting left much room for growth.
meanings.sent5: The unimproved garden lacked the beauty of a well-tended one.

meanings.definition: Not developed or changed for the better
meanings.sent1: The unimproved technology was outdated and inefficient.
meanings.sent2: The unimproved area remained untouched for years.
meanings.sent3: His unimproved attempt at cooking resulted in a burnt dinner.
meanings.sent4: The unimproved relationship between the two countries led to tension.
meanings.sent5: The unimproved manuscript lacked the revisions needed for publication.
